title: Rajeshwari Haaram: Emerald and Ruby Regal Necklace
features: Graduated ruby stations accented with diamond clusters lead to a stunning pendant featuring a hand-carved emerald. The pendantâ€™s setting showcases an elaborate diamond halo, enhancing the emerald's brilliance. The intricate craftsmanship reflects traditional Telugu artistry, while the clean lines offer a modern sensibility.
colors: Dominant colors include vibrant ruby red
and the warm glow of yellow gold. The diamonds add a sparkling white contrast
creating a visually rich and harmonious palette.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and festive celebrations. Also suitable for formal gatherings and cultural events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Rajeshwari Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exquisite craftsmanship. The combination of rubies, diamonds, and a carved emerald makes it a rare and valuable piece. The Hyderabadi gold polish enhances its antique charm, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The intricate design and vibrant colors reflect the rich cultural heritage of South India, while the modern silhouette adds a touch of sophistication.
